basics.label: Consumer Services Advocate
basics.summary: Dedicated Customer Service Representative motivated to maintain customer satisfaction and contribute to company success.

work.summary: Answered the phones, sent emails, placed orders, spoke with customers, provided troubleshooting tips, and trained new hires. Helped the company grow into a multi-branded company. Cross-trained and provided back-up for other customer service representatives when needed. Developed highly empathetic client relationships and earned a reputation for exceeding sales goals. Generated sales and inventory reports with a 100% accuracy rate. Prepared and sold a broad range of customized merchandise.
highlights: Helped the company grow into a multi branded company
Assisted my agent in surpassing his sales goal for the month by $30,000
Accurately logged all daily shipping and receiving orders
Assisted customers with store and product complaints
Developed highly empathetic client relationships and earned reputation for exceeding sales goals
Interacted with customers and expedited orders
Assisted customers with store and product complaints
Developed new customer prospects or referrals
Prevented store losses using awareness, attention to detail and integrity
Assisted customers in finding out-of-stock items

work.summary: Fulfilled the responsibilities of a Seaman Recruit in US Navy basic training program.
highlights: Selected to lay watch over entire division
Selected as Guidon for my division
